response:
Urgent differentiation between axonal and demyelinating pathology is required via electrophysiology. A lumbar puncture is indicated to screen for albuminocytologic dissociation (GBS). Comprehensive bloods are needed to identify reversible metabolic, autoimmune, or infectious etiologies.

investigations = ["Nerve Conduction Studies and EMG", "Lumbar Puncture", "Full blood count", "Urea and electrolytes", "Liver function tests", "HbA1c", "Vitamin B12 and Folate", "Serum Protein Electrophoresis", "Thyroid Function Tests", "Antinuclear Antibody (ANA)", "ANCA screen", "Anti-ganglioside antibodies"]
